text: ane musa (a.Sa.)E kahyum ke he amara palanahara! Tem phira'auna ane tena saradarone sanagarano samana ane alaga-alaga prakaranum dhana duniyana jivanamam apyum. He amara palanahara! (A karane apyum che ke) te loko tara margathi lokone pathabhrasta kare, he amara palanahara! Temana dhanane nasta kari de ane temana hrdayone sakhata kari de, jethi a loko imana na lavi sake, tyam sudhi ke du:Khadayi yatanane jo'i le
